https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xRfj3J1BEqYsPFMKB1p4nvtFCpD.jpg Louise meets Nathan, her dreams resurface. It's also the story of her ailing brother, their mother, and the destiny of a leading family of wealthy Italian industrialists. The story of a family falling apart, a world coming to an end and love beginning. A Castle in Italy
